name: Salary Invoice

html:
Consultancy Invoice

{{ doc.employee_name }}

{% set id_code = doc.name.split('/')[-1] %} {% set emp_address = frappe.db.get_value('Employee', doc.employee, 'current_address') %}
Consultancy Invoice: {{ id_code }}/{{ doc.invoice_date.strftime('%m') }}/{{ doc.invoice_date.strftime('%Y') }} Invoice Date : {{ frappe.format(doc.invoice_date, {'fieldtype': 'Date'}) }}
Consultant Address : {{ emp_address }} Company Address : Techno Limited
Consultant ID : {{ doc.employee }} No Of Days Worked : {{ doc.no_of_days_worked }} Days
Consultant Name : {{ doc.employee_name }} Contract Name : {{ doc.contract_name }}
Consultancy Fee : {{ frappe.format(doc.salary_amount, {'fieldtype': 'Currency'}) }} Consultancy Fee Currency : {{ doc.salary_currency }}
Account Holder Name : {{ doc.account_holder_name }} Beneficiary Bank Name: {{ doc.beneficiary_bank_name }}
Account Number : {{ doc.account_number }} SWIFT Code: {{ doc.swift_code }}
Consultant Signature
name: Salary Invoice - 1
